analysis.description:
BasicToken.balances (/unique_chucks/28/0xe5ce9fa34bee24478407cf61c0f081aa189f81d2.sol#37-39) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/28/0xe5ce9fa34bee24478407cf61c0f081aa189f81d2.sol#39-42)
accessTokens in Crowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xe5ce9fa34bee24478407cf61c0f081aa189f81d2.sol#304) is a local variable never initialiazed

ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xe5ce9fa34bee24478407cf61c0f081aa189f81d2.sol#4-5)
StoneToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xe5ce9fa34bee24478407cf61c0f081aa189f81d2.sol#373)
StoneToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xe5ce9fa34bee24478407cf61c0f081aa189f81d2.sol#368-369)
StoneToken.standard should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xe5ce9fa34bee24478407cf61c0f081aa189f81d2.sol#367-368)
StoneToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xe5ce9fa34bee24478407cf61c0f081aa189f81d2.sol#370-373)
